snippet: The opening of an office in Lower Manhattan gives Goodby, Silverstein & Partners a presence in New York, the capital of advertising, for the first time.
abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column; San Francisco firm Goodby, Silverstein & Partners will open Manhattan office, giving them a presence in the advertising capital for the first time.
lead_paragraph: The opening of an office in Lower Manhattan gives Goodby, Silverstein & Partners a presence in New York, the capital of advertising, for the first time.

headline.seo: Ad Agency Goodby, Silverstein Opens a New York Office
headline.main: An Agency a Continent Away Expands to the Ad Capital
headline.print_headline: An Agency a Continent Away Expands to the Ad Capital
